name: mvccore/ext-modelform
description: MvcCore - Extension - ModelForm - extension to build forms by decorated model classes.

suggest.mvccore/ext-cache-*: MvcCore cache extensions to speed up operations driven by class anotations.
suggest.mvccore/ext-form-field-text: MvcCore form extension with input field types text, email, password, search, tel, url and textarea field.
suggest.mvccore/ext-form-field-numeric: MvcCore form extension with input field types number and range.
suggest.mvccore/ext-form-field-selection: MvcCore form extension with fields select, country select, checkbox(es) and radios.
suggest.mvccore/ext-form-field-date: MvcCore form extension with input field types date, datetime, time, week and month.
suggest.mvccore/ext-form-field-button: MvcCore form extension with button fields and input submit fields.
suggest.mvccore/ext-form-field-special: MvcCore form extension with input type file and color.
suggest.mvccore/ext-form-validator-special: MvcCore form extension with special text and numeric validators.
